```{r}
popularity <- c(63, 62, 57, 48, 54, 51, 58, 47, 55, 53, 47, 50, 67)

similarity_to_past <- c(0.6065,
 0.2033,
 0.0551,
 0.1626,
 0.0355,
 0.3339,
 -0.3173,
 -0.5519,
 -0.15,
 -0.1672,
 -0.3552,
 -0.0799,
 0.0659)


linreg <- lm(popularity ~ similarity_to_past)
summary(linreg)

plot(similarity_to_past, popularity, 
    main = "Popularity vs Similarity to Past for Title Tracks", 
    xlab = "Similarity to Past",
    ylab = "Popularity")
abline(linreg, col = "red")
```
